com.advantech.nfclib

Class NFCManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.advantech.nfclib.NFCManager

  • public class NFCManager
extends java.lang.Object
    NFCManager is a singleton class for NFC communication with Advantech EPD devices. This class provides basic functions for detecting NFC cards, display images, unlock PIN code, set PIN code, and reset PIN code. Please git pull the sample project to explore these functions.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Fabian Chung

      NFC Tag State.
